title: Set up Connect RPC client in Next.js for backend communication
description: Install and configure Connect RPC client libraries in Next.js. Create API client utilities for communicating with Go backend services.

title: MCP Server for Conversational Queries
description: MCP server exposing portfolio data as tools for AI chat: query_holdings, get_quotes, get_portfolio_value, get_daily_pnl, get_allocation, calculate_rebalance, get_net_worth. See README.md Conversational Agent section.

title: Implement query_holdings MCP tool
description: MCP tool to query holdings with optional filters: household, account, symbol. Returns current positions with quantities, prices, market values. See README.md Conversational Agent tools section.

title: Implement get_portfolio_value MCP tool
description: MCP tool to calculate total portfolio value. Takes optional household filter. Multiplies current holdings by live prices from quotes service. Returns total market value across accounts.

title: Implement get_daily_pnl MCP tool
description: MCP tool to calculate today's gain/loss. Compares today's portfolio value to yesterday's snapshot. Takes optional household filter. Returns dollar and percentage change.

title: Implement calculate_rebalance MCP tool
description: MCP tool to generate rebalancing recommendations. Takes household and optional target allocation. Calls rebalancing engine service. Returns current vs target allocation diff and suggested trades.

title: Build custom UI skill for Claude Code
description: Implement custom Claude Code skill that integrates the portfolio flow and provides UI development assistance
notes: Portfolio flow complete with live HTML examples. Ready to finalize skill installation and testing.
close_reason: Completed: Built custom UI skill (ui-portfolio-design) and Next.js dashboard with Paper Portfolio design system

title: Custom UI Skills for Claude Code
description: Implement custom UI-focused Claude Code skills with portfolio-style design selection flow
close_reason: Completed: Created ui-portfolio-design and land-the-plane skills, built Next.js dashboard with Paper Portfolio design system

title: Income Reporting
description: CLI commands for income aggregation and reporting. Group interest and dividends by security, support YTD/monthly rollups. Phase 2 from services/holdings/docs/cash-tracking.md

title: Add income summary CLI command
description: Implement 'go run cmd/main.go income summary --account-name X --year Y' command. Shows interest and dividend totals by type. Outputs human-readable format as shown in cash-tracking.md example. Acceptance: Command runs, groups by type, shows totals.

title: Add income by security grouping
description: Implement 'go run cmd/main.go income by-security --account-name X' command. Shows interest income grouped by security (bond CUSIP/symbol). Critical for bond interest tracking per holding. Reference: Phase 2 task 'Group by security' in cash-tracking.md.

title: Add YTD income rollup
description: Enhance income commands to calculate year-to-date totals. Sum all income from Jan 1 to current date for current year. Display YTD total in summary output.

title: Add monthly income rollup
description: Enhance income commands to show monthly breakdowns. Group income transactions by month and display month-by-month totals. Useful for tracking recurring bond interest payments (typically semi-annual).

title: Bond Enhancements
description: Bond-specific transaction handling: accrued interest on purchases/sales, maturity and call events, premium/discount amortization. Phase 3 from services/holdings/docs/cash-tracking.md

title: Track accrued interest on bond purchases
description: When buying a bond, buyer pays seller for interest accrued since last coupon. Track this separately in cash_transactions. Amount includes accrued interest portion. See cash-tracking.md 'Bond-Specific Considerations' and LPL mapping.

title: Track accrued interest on bond sales
description: When selling a bond, seller receives accrued interest from buyer. Track this separately in proceeds. Amount includes accrued interest portion. Mirror of purchase accrued interest tracking.

title: Handle bond maturity events
description: When a bond matures, principal is returned at par value. Create appropriate transaction to dispose of the bond lot and record the cash proceeds. Track maturity dates from bond master data.

title: Handle bond call events
description: When an issuer calls (redeems early) a bond, principal is returned at call price. Similar to maturity but may have different price. Track call dates and call prices from bond master data.

title: Implement premium/discount amortization (optional)
description: Bonds trading above par (premium) or below par (discount) should have the difference amortized over the bond's life. This affects cost basis and realized gain/loss at maturity. Optional enhancement for accurate tax reporting. Marked optional in cash-tracking.md Phase 3.

title: Research ui-skills.com and available UI skill options
description: Research ui-skills.com, Claude Code skills ecosystem, and other UI-focused tooling available for AI-assisted UI development
notes: Research complete. Findings documented in .claude/research/ui-skills-research.md. No ui-skills.com exists, but rich ecosystem of Claude skills available from Anthropic and community.

title: Implement portfolio design selection flow
description: Build a flow that presents ~10 style/design options before any UI implementation work, allowing user to pick their preferred aesthetic
notes: Portfolio design selection flow implemented. Created complete skill structure in .claude/skills/ui-portfolio-design/ with: SKILL.md (workflow+instructions), design-systems.md (10 complete design systems), README.md (documentation), examples.md (visual code examples). Ready for implementation task.

title: Frontend Dashboard
description: Next.js dashboard for portfolio visualization: holdings table, allocation pie chart, daily P&L, CSV upload component, household filtering. See README.md architecture section.

title: Build holdings table component
description: React component showing current holdings: account, symbol, quantity, price, market value, cost basis, gain/loss. Support sorting and filtering. Uses TanStack Query for data fetching from holdings API.
notes: UI component completed with Paper Portfolio design and mock data. Still needs: Connect RPC client integration, TanStack Query setup, real API data fetching.

title: Build allocation pie chart component
description: React component visualizing portfolio allocation by asset class. Shows current vs target allocation percentages. Uses Chart.js or similar library for interactive pie chart.

title: Build CSV upload component
description: React component for uploading brokerage CSV files. Select broker type (Schwab, E*Trade, Fidelity, LPL), choose file, preview import, submit. Calls BatchUpsertTransactions RPC endpoint.

title: Build AI chat popup component
description: Sidebar/popup chat interface for conversational queries. User asks questions in natural language, Claude responds using MCP tools. Shows chat history, streaming responses. Integrates with MCP server once available.

title: Replace mock data with real API calls in dashboard
description: Remove hardcoded mock data from dashboard components. Implement TanStack Query hooks to fetch holdings, quotes, and portfolio data from Go backend via Connect RPC.

title: Create 'land the plane' skill for proper session completion
close_reason: Created land-the-plane skill with complete workflow for session completion

title: Rebalancing Engine
description: Advisory-only rebalancing engine. Takes current holdings, target allocation, and security→asset class mapping. Outputs allocation diff and trade recommendations. Tax-lot awareness optional. See README.md Rebalancing Engine section.

title: Implement allocation diff calculator
description: Calculate current asset class allocation from holdings. Compare to target allocation. Return percentage differences (e.g., 'US Equity: 65% actual vs 60% target, +5%'). See README.md Rebalancing Engine section.

title: Implement trade recommendation engine
description: Generate specific buy/sell recommendations to rebalance portfolio. Input: current holdings, target allocation, security→asset class mapping. Output: suggested trades (buy X shares of Y, sell Z shares of W). Advisory only, no execution.

title: Add tax-lot aware recommendations (optional)
description: Enhance rebalancing to consider tax implications. Prefer selling lots with losses for tax-loss harvesting. Avoid triggering short-term capital gains when possible. Marked optional in README.md. Lower priority than basic rebalancing.

title: Quotes Service
description: Market data service for live price quotes. Use Yahoo Finance unofficial API (no auth). Cache quotes 15 min. Returns price, change, change_pct, market_cap. See README.md Market Data section.

title: Implement Yahoo Finance API integration
description: Integrate unofficial Yahoo Finance API for live stock/ETF quotes. Use existing Go library (no auth required). Returns price, change, change_pct, market_cap. See README.md Market Data section.

title: Add 15-minute quote caching
description: Cache quote data in memory for 15 minutes to avoid hammering Yahoo Finance. Use sync.Map or similar for thread-safe cache. Refresh on cache miss or expiry.

title: Add GetQuotes Connect RPC endpoint
description: Create protobuf service definition and Go implementation for GetQuotes RPC. Takes list of symbols, returns cached/fresh quote data. Define in api/monay/v1beta1/quotes-service.proto and implement in services/quotes/.

title: Stock Plan Importer
description: Parse E*Trade Stock Plan exports (Gains & Losses, Tax Information) to auto-create lots for RSU/ESPP transactions. Links stock plan lots to associated brokerage accounts. See README.md 'Stock Plan Accounts' section for requirements.

title: Parse E*Trade Gains & Losses CSV
description: Parse E*Trade Stock Plan 'Gains & Losses' export CSV format. Extract vest dates, quantities, FMV at vest, and cost basis for RSU/ESPP lots. Handle both RSU vests and ESPP purchases. Reference: README.md Stock Plan Accounts section.

title: Parse E*Trade Tax Information CSV
description: Parse E*Trade Stock Plan 'Tax Information' export CSV format. Alternative data source for vest/purchase events with tax basis information. Extract vest schedule data and purchase dates.

title: Auto-create lots for RSU vest events
description: When RSU vests, auto-create a lot with: quantity = shares vested, cost_basis = FMV at vest date (taxed as income), date = vest date. RSUs have no purchase transaction, only vest events.

title: Auto-create lots for ESPP purchase events
description: When ESPP purchase occurs, auto-create a lot with: quantity = shares purchased, cost_basis = purchase price (often 85% of FMV), date = purchase date. ESPP purchases are periodic buys at discount.

title: Link stock plan lots to brokerage account
description: Stock Plan accounts are linked to regular brokerage accounts (shares transfer there when sold). Track the account linkage and handle lot transfers between accounts. Acceptance: Can identify which brokerage account receives sold shares.
